entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog at times overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog at times in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
